lead_paragraph: American Jimmy Walker clinched the 98th PGA Championship by one shot over Australian world number one Jason Day at Baltusrol Golf Club in Springfield, New Jersey, on Sunday to compete a 2016 sweep for first-time major winners.

headline.print_headline: Factbox: PGA Championship Winner Jimmy Walker
headline.main: Factbox: PGA Championship Winner Jimmy Walker
